TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Nigeria, title = Nigeria, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigeria} }

S.FORM: Nigeria hya' ga cyux maki' tay 10 00 N, 8 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 923,768 sq km (maki' tay 32ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 910,768 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 13,000 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 186,053,386. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 78 , lhlahuy hya' ga 9.50 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 12.50 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Abuja. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mawpuw byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Muhammadu Buhari, aring ryax 29 squ byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
